sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个形容词均有"不情愿的，不愿意的"之意。
means: unwilling ： 语气强烈，指有力的否定、拒绝。也可指被牵涉于非本意之事。
reluctant ： 指做不赞同的，不很乐意的或害怕的事，有时也指坚决反对某事。

sentence.Network_en: We were reluctant to start the long trudge home.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们很不愿意踏上如此漫长艰辛的回家之路。

sentence.Network_en: Scientific institutions have been reluctant to take corrective action.
sentence.Network_cn: 科学机构一直不愿作出更正。

sentence.Network_en: I am reluctant to trust anyone totally, Your Excellency.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不想完全相信任何人，阁下。

am reluctant to let him leave ., 我舍不得让他离开.
《趣味背单词》(免费) - 豆丁网 ... ant( 蚂蚁) 干活总是 reluctant( 不愿意) 瞎说自己 pregnant( 怀孕的) 为了育好.

磁阻马达(Reluctance Motor) 音圈马达(Voice-Coil Motor)   线性马达(Linear Motor)   Solenoid and Ratchet Type Step Motor  Harm.

步进马达的结构有好几种，包括可变磁阻(variable reluctance)、永磁和混合式永磁(hybrid permanent magnet)，永磁步进马达的成本 …
1923年，苏格兰人James Weir French 发明三相可变磁阻型（variable reluctance）（Variable reluctance）步进马达。1962年，藉霍尔元件之助，实用之DC …

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent. (in the sense 'writhing, offering opposition'): from Latin reluctant- 'struggling against', from the verb reluctari, from re- (expressing intensive force) + luctari 'to struggle'

entry.def: If you are reluctant to do something, you are unwilling to do it and hesitate before doing it, or do it slowly and without enthusiasm.

example.ex: Mr Spero was reluctant to ask for help...
example.tran: 斯佩罗先生不愿意寻求帮助。

example.ex: The police are very reluctant to get involved in this sort of thing.
example.tran: 警方很不愿意卷入这类事情。

means.word_mean: 1. unwillingness to do something contrary to your custom;

sentences.sentence: "foreigners stubbornly uneager to accept our ways"
"fresh from college and uneager for the moment to marry him"

auth_sentence.content: Officials are reluctant to be so predictable this time.
auth_sentence.res_content: Officials are reluctant to be so predictable this time.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Officials are reluctant to be so predictable this time.

auth_sentence.content: He says some people are reluctant to embrace democracy.
auth_sentence.res_content: He says some people are reluctant to embrace democracy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He says some people are reluctant to embrace democracy.

auth_sentence.content: So we became reluctant celibates within our own marriage.
auth_sentence.res_content: So we became reluctant celibates within our own marriage.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So we became reluctant celibates within our own marriage.

Sentence.sentence: They are reluctant to give up their personal information.
And instead, I grew up believing that I was supposed to be totally independent and consequently became very reluctant to ask for help.
And instead, I grew up believing that I was supposed to be totally independent and consequently became very reluctant to ask for help.
For example, the shortage of young adults is likely to make countries more reluctant to commit the few they have to military service.

sentences.en: He gave me a reluctant assistance.
sentences.cn: 他很不情愿地给了我帮助。

sentences.en: I am reluctant about asking him to do this.
sentences.cn: 我极不愿意让他去干此事。

jushi.english: He gave me a reluctant assistance.
jushi.chinese: 他很不情愿地给了我帮助。

jushi.english: I am reluctant about asking him to do this.
jushi.chinese: 我极不愿意让他去干此事。

jushi.english: He is reluctant to be photographed.
